name: Billionaire Simulator - Rags to Riches
description:
You are poor. You have no money. Life is unfair. Until you discover a mysterious software on your computer that allows you to make money by just clicking your mouse. The more you click, the more you make. Pretty soon, you're wealthier than you could have possibly imagined... And yet you want more.

In this incredibly immersive Billionaire Simulator, you can go from having $0 in your bank account, to having Billions by strategically starting businesses and purchasing Real Estate, earning salaries from them, and selling them.

Your companies are infinitely expandable.

Your garage can be packed with over 35 unique cars.

You can own as many companies as you like.

You can purchase Private Islands and Luxury Superyachts.

And if you're feeling particularly bold, you can invest in Cryptocurrency and try to make a profit.

The more you click the Magic Money Button, the more you earn, the more businesses you can buy, and the richer you become.
So go ahead and click that button! You're totally not giving away a piece of your soul every time you do...

Slowly grow your empire over time and invest your money wisely. Because as easily as you became rich, your bank account can go back down to zero with 1 bad business decision!

Game Features:
  • A simulated Crypto Exchange with real-world prices/fluctuations.
  • 10 Different industries you can start a business in (Shop, Factory, Rideshare, Shipping, Construction, Car Dealership, Bank, Tech Company, Sports Team, Oil Company)
  • Company Management Mechanics
  • Real Estate Purchasing/Renting Mechanics
  • A vast garage of sports cars to buy and sell
  • The ability to purchase: Yachts, Private Islands, Motorcycles, Luxury Cars, and Dozens of Mansions
  • And an Infinite Potential for earnings.

If you manage your empire wisely, business by business, you may have a real fortune on your hands in no time.


This game has infinite playtime, and is as fun as your greed and ambition allow it to be!
